title: I'm a Weak Mom
description:
Even though her daughter rejects her, Annie keeps trying to help her bratty, snowflake daughter become a happy, successful adult. - Dr. Laura: "Once your child grows up, it's her life to live."

Are you still trying to "parent" your grown children? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
